snippet: There were no serious injuries, according to fire officials, after an airplane carrying 132 passengers landed in a late-season snowstorm.
abstract: Delta Air Lines Flight 1086 skids off Runway 13 at La Guardia Airport, stopping short of Flushing Bay; wintry conditions in New York City contribute to mishap; none among 127 passengers and five crew members are seriously injured.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and PATRICK McGEEHAN
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Matt Flegenheimer, J. David Goodman, Liam Stack and John Surico, and research by Alain Delaquérière.

lead_paragraph: There were no serious injuries, according to fire officials, after an airplane carrying 132 passengers landed in a late-season snowstorm.

headline.main: Plane Avoids Disaster as It Skids Off a Runway at La Guardia Airport
headline.print_headline: Jet With 132 Aboard Avoids Disaster as It Skids Off a Runway
